A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class TerrarithmeticApp
This method is used for determining what should take place after certain actions.

This method is used to add a card to the Deck.

This method adds a Card to the player's Deck.

This method adds a computer character to the map.
addLoss() - Method in class Player
This adds a loss to the player's total losses.
addScore(HighScore) - Method in class HighScoreList
This method is used to add a HighScore to the list of scores.
addTrack(String) - Method in class AudioHandler
This method adds an audio clip to the array of tracks if it does not already exist.
addWin() - Method in class Player
This adds a win to the player's total wins.
animating() - Method in class Tile
This method returns true if the Tile is currently animating.
animationLength() - Method in class Tile
This method returns the number of frames in the Tile's animation.
animationSprites - Variable in class Entity
This stores the array of sprites for the walking animation of the character.
animLength() - Method in class Tile
This method returns the length of the animation of this Tile.
audio - Static variable in class TerrarithmeticApp
This handles audio output.
AudioHandler - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to handle audio output and manage currently playing tracks.

This defines the numerical value for the bottom layer.
Buffer - Class in <Unnamed>
The Buffer class is used for taking information from game components and formatting it into a display.
Buffer(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Buffer
This constructor creates a buffer of the specified width and height in pixels with the specified game component size.
BufferedKeyboard - Class in <Unnamed>
The BufferedKeyboard class uses an array when listening for key input to smoothen the transition between the keys that are pressed.
BufferedKeyboard() - Constructor for class BufferedKeyboard
 
BufferedMouse - Class in <Unnamed>
The BufferedMouse class takes and stores input from the mouse so that other classes can access and remove the information when needed.
BufferedMouse() - Constructor for class BufferedMouse
 

C

Card - Class in <Unnamed>
The Card class is used to construct cards that will be either operators or numbers in a Deck.
Card(int, Sprite) - Constructor for class Card
This constructor creates a Card that will be a number with a value and image.
Card(String, Sprite) - Constructor for class Card
This constructor creates a Card that will be an operator with an operator and image.
CARD_NPC - Static variable in class Map
This defines the numerical value for a CardGameNPC.
CardGameNPC - Class in <Unnamed>
The CardGameNPC class is created so that NPCs can be added to the game which the player can play a Card game against.
CardGameNPC(String, int, int, Deck, Sprite, String) - Constructor for class CardGameNPC
This constructs a new instance of the Card game NPC class with a specified character model, the specified x and y coordinates, and the specified Deck.
cardImage() - Method in class Card
This method returns the Sprite of a Card which will be used when drawing Sprites.
centerView(int, int) - Method in class Buffer
This method is intended to center the view of the buffer around the specified x and y coordinates in relation to the game components passed into it.
centerView(int, int) - Method in class EntityBuffer
This method is intended to center the view of the buffer around the specified x and y coordinates in relation to the game components passed into it.
centerView(int, int) - Method in class TileBuffer
This method centers the view of the buffer around the specified x and y coordinates in relation to the Tile components.
changeDirection(int) - Method in class Entity
This method sets the player's direction to be the specified direction.
changeDirection() - Method in class NPC
This method randomly changes the direction of the NPC.
characterName() - Method in class Entity
This method returns the character name.

This method clears the Board by setting the values of the Cards on the Board to null.

This method clears all images on the dialogue layer.
cleared() - Method in class Map
This method checks all the CardGameNPCs in the map have been faced.

This is an integer value representing the Computer.

This method is used to perform the computer's actions when it is the computer's turn.

This method copies the contents of one file to another.

This method is used to count the number of occurences of the Cards of a specified value.

This method is used to count the number of occurences of the Cards of a specified operator.

This method is used to return the index of the current number.

This method is used to return the index of the current operator.

K

keyCodeEquals(int) - Method in class BufferedKeyboard
This method is intended to compare the specified integer to the first key code in the buffer.
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class BufferedKeyboard
This method overrides the keyPressed method in the KeyListener class and adds the pressed keys into the key buffer.
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class BufferedKeyboard
This method overrides the keyReleased method in the KeyListener class and removes the first key from the buffer and replaces it with the second value.
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class BufferedKeyboard
This method overrides the keyTyped method in the KeyListener class.
